title: Abduction
description: This book has more than one point of view. If you prefer to avoid multiple perspectives, this book may not be your cup of tea.*The first few chapters have been rewritten to take out the lengthy conversation in which Tiffany's abductor explains Zartoto to her at the start of the book. I've listened to my readers and took your advice to remove that bit. I appreciate the feedback. This is a new edition.Tiffany's world is turned upside down when she's abducted to a post-apocalyptic planet infested with energy vampires. But Zartoto is no ordinary place â€“ it's inhabited by blue aliens called Zartotians, with four horns serving as their ears. Zartotians wield magic through their body language, casting spells like you've never seen before. As Tiffany adapts to this alien planet, she uncovers a stunning humans can harness magic too, but only while on Zartoto. Amidst the chaos, shape-shifting wonders lurk, transforming into powerful bears and elusive wolves. But danger looms larger than ever before, and Tiffany steps up to protect the community from an unimaginable threat. Join Tiffany on an extraordinary journey of magic, courage, and the bonds that unite them all. Will she save Zartoto from its impending doom? Find out in this breathtaking tale that will leave you spellbound until the very last page!This series is officially complete!
author: Callie Woodridge
